The Blood Bucket is going to be live with a vision to provide safe blood, meeting international standards to all segments of the society without any discrimination. The Blood Bucket is aimed to mobilize the nation towards 100% voluntary blood donations. In a span of just a few years, the Blood Center will not only been able to support Hospital all around the country. VOLUNTARY BLOOD DONATION DRIVE You can become someone’s lifeline – conduct Blood Drive at your organization, school or community. Donations can also be made through Blood Bucket. It is just a little effort to save someone's life because every life matters
